DOC.brief_summary: To assess the clinical and radiographic outcomes through 5-years following treatment with CHARITÉ™ Artificial Disc vs. the BAK Cage for treatment of degenerative disc disease at one level (L4-S1).
DOC.detailed_description: This study is an extension out to 5 year follow-up of a randomized comparative IDE trial of the CHARITÉ™ Artificial Disc vs. ALIF with the BAK cage for treatment of degenerative disc disease. The original 2-year trial demonstrated non-inferiority of the CHARITÉ™ compared to ALIF. This extension will continue to follow-up the original outcome measures and will also examine adjacent segment progression.
DOC.criteria: Participated in either the training or randomized arm of the CHARITÉ Artificial Disc IDE study, Still have the original implant they received in their index surgery.
